LanguageData.ATR_SplitConsciousness.label: Split consciousness
LanguageData.ATR_SplitConsciousness.description: The consciousness controlling this body is split, as it also controls other bodies. This effectively reduces the consciousness's ability to execute fine control over this body. More bodies means a steeper penalty.
LanguageData.ATR_SplitConsciousness.stages.0.label: Safe
LanguageData.ATR_SplitConsciousness.stages.1.label: Trivial
LanguageData.ATR_SplitConsciousness.stages.2.label: Manageable
LanguageData.ATR_SplitConsciousness.stages.3.label: Difficult
LanguageData.ATR_SplitConsciousness.stages.4.label: Intense
LanguageData.ATR_SplitConsciousness.stages.5.label: Extreme
LanguageData.ATR_ForeignConsciousness.label: Foreign consciousness
LanguageData.ATR_ForeignConsciousness.description: The consciousness controlling this body belongs to another faction. The controller will disconnect upon it being downed, and will likely trigger a core self-destruct.
LanguageData.ATR_MindOperation.label: SkyMind operation in progress
LanguageData.ATR_MindOperation.description: This unit is currently undergoing a SkyMind operation. In order to maintain the connection and integrity, the consciousness is not currently in control of this body.
LanguageData.ATR_NoController.label: No controller connected
LanguageData.ATR_NoController.description: This surrogate has no controller and is therefore incapable of autonomous action.
